column2: You have fallen in love with another, but the objections of others prevent you from taking this a step further. Is it time to bring your love out into the open, no matter the consequences?
Your love can be hidden no longer. Perhaps it is time to make it known to everyone...
You are blessed to have a talented spouse. Perhaps your realm could benefit from [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] expertise...
Perhaps your spouse would be willing to assist you to improve your realm.
You have found another like-minded woman that seems agreeable to you. Perhaps [Root.GetTitledFirstName] would be willing to enter a marriage?
You have the knowledge to create a life-giving elixir. Perhaps it is time to make use of it?
Beyond the orthodox knowledge held by the priests, you know that there is more out there. Perhaps it is time for you to seek it out, given your ample means...
